####################################################################################
##### Lens is currently undergoing a huge refactor in the `modularize` branch.
##### The cutting edge build can be considered broken for next 1-2 weeks.
#####
#####  For a stable version check the `gh-pages` branch.

Code: bash    $ git clone https://github.com/substance/screwdriver.git    $ cd screwdriver    $ sudo python setup.py install

RawBlock:
<!--
#### Work with feature branches

A good start is working with fresh feature branches.

1. Create a feature branch across all sub-modules.

   ```bash
   $ substance --git -- checkout -b <feature_branch_name>
   ```

2. Edit `project.json` manually (replace branch: master with your feature-branch-name)

3. Checkout configured branches of sub-modules
 
   ```bash
   $ substance --checkout
   ```
-->
